My provisions in the Opioid Crisis Response Act would: 

‚úÖ Establish Interagency Task Force 

‚úÖ Increase funding for Nat'l Child Traumatic Stress Initiative

‚úÖ Provide grants for mental health support in schools 

‚úÖ Address health professional workforce shortages

Provisions come from a bill I introduced to address the harsh impact exposure to trauma can have on children & families. Abuse, neglect, witness crime & mental illness are traumatic experiences & can lead to a lifetime of health & behavioral challenges. http://bismarcktribune.com/news/local/govt-and-politics/proposed-task-force-to-identify-needs-for-trauma-services/article_97673515-0f61-53c1-b4fc-8d6e956080ae.html
